definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: thoroughly, RV. With (all) diligence (Zend aspĕ re, asperenÕ, Pers. siparī asperī, all complete, Castell [1669], Thes Haug:JBW 1853, 154 Lag;Sem. i. 48 Andr:Marti, Ga 53* Scheft:MGWJ 1903, 415 (correcting Arisches im AT. 73 f,));—Ezr 5:8 ´[[א]]: [[מִתְעַבְדָא]], Ezr 6:8, Ezr 6:12, Ezr 6:13, Ezr 7:17, Ezr 7:21, Ezr 7:26 (cf. OAram. [[אספרן]], on a weight,complete, correct: Lab:223, Cooke:193).
